infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Avid Outdoorsman needs your location to show nearby outdoor spots, trails, and connect you with local outdoorsmen.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: Avid Outdoorsman needs your location to track your outdoor activities and show nearby updates even when the app is in the background.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: Avid Outdoorsman needs your location to track your outdoor activities and show nearby updates even when the app is in the background.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Avid Outdoorsman needs camera access to let you share photos of trails, catches, and outdoor conditions.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Avid Outdoorsman needs photo library access to let you share images from your gallery.
infoPlist.NSMotionUsageDescription: Avid Outdoorsman uses motion data to track your outdoor activities and calculate distance and elevation.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Allow Avid Outdoorsman to use your location to track activities and show nearby outdoor updates.
plugins.locationAlwaysPermission: Allow Avid Outdoorsman to use your location to track activities and show nearby outdoor updates.
plugins.locationWhenInUsePermission: Allow Avid Outdoorsman to use your location to show nearby outdoor spots and trails.

plugins.photosPermission: Avid Outdoorsman needs access to your photos to let you share outdoor experiences.
plugins.cameraPermission: Avid Outdoorsman needs camera access to let you capture and share outdoor moments.
